decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive green creatures and ramp up mana quickly through devotion to green, with cards like Llanowar Elves and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx. This allows for the early deployment of powerful creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns, while also generating card advantage with Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Storm the Festival. Boseiju, Who Endures provides protection for important spells, while Leyline of the Guildpact helps to support the aggressive strategy. Lair of the Hydra and Sunken Citadel provide additional utility and flexibility in the mana base.

The deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field and various untap effects to generate a large amount of mana quickly. By combining cards like Hidden Strings, Vizier of Tumbling Sands, and Strict Proctor, the deck aims to ramp up mana production to cast powerful spells like Omniscience, Emergent Ultimatum, and Peer into the Abyss. The inclusion of cards like Bala Ged Recovery and Dark Petition provide additional options for card recursion and tutor effects. The overall strategy is to assemble the combo pieces efficiently to overwhelm opponents with high-impact spells.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption, removal spells, and board wipes. It aims to control the board by efficiently dealing with threats while also generating card advantage and resource advantage through planeswalkers and graveyard interaction. The deck utilizes a variety of removal spells to efficiently deal with different types of threats, while also having access to powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and Professor Onyx to generate additional value and pressure the opponent. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistency in its execution.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and direct removal spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck includes a companion card, Jegantha, the Wellspring, and features cards like Bloodtithe Harvester, Bonecrusher Giant, and Caustic Bronco to apply pressure. Graveyard Trespasser and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional threats, while Thoughtseize and Fatal Push offer disruption. The deck also includes utility lands like Den of the Bugbear and Hive of the Eye Tyrant for added versatility. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and efficient in dealing damage to the opponent.

The primary focus of this Dimir Control deck is to maintain control of the game through disruption and card advantage. With a mix of counter spells, removal spells, and card draw, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for additional value through blinking permanents for extra ETB effects. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the control strategy while also providing enough colored sources for consistency. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing its own dominant position on the battlefield.
